Slide¶

This comments are not included in the docstrings.

class Slide.Slide(settings, data)[source]¶
__init__(settings, data)[source]¶

Constructor

Parameters:
  • settings (string) – Settings list including ROOT, LANG, TEMPLATE, etc.
  • data (dictionnary) – Data read from the yaml file and used to generate the slide
Returns:

Object Slide
Return type:

Slide
